channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to the binding of a single network component to a single SoftLayer IP address. Local Relational ipAddress The IP address associated with this object's network component. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress networkComponent The network component associated with this object's IP address. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Component
